meanings.definition: Serving as a symbol or representation.
meanings.sent1: The flag was emblematical of our country.
meanings.sent2: The statue had an emblematical meaning of peace.
meanings.sent3: The emblematical bird on the logo made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was emblematical of her happiness.
meanings.sent5: The emblematical rose symbolized love and beauty.

meanings.sent1: The colors used in the painting were emblematical of the artist's emotions.
meanings.sent2: The handshake was emblematical of their agreement.
meanings.sent3: The emblematical key unlocked the mystery to their success.
meanings.sent4: His silence was emblematical of his deep thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The emblematical star guided them through the dark night.
